description: From foot +‎ path. Compare Saterland Frisian Foutpaad (“footpath”), West Frisian fuotpaad (“footpath”), Dutch voetpad (“footpath”), German Low German Footpadd (“footpath”), German Fußpfad (“footpath”).

entries.meaning: Any set path or trail to be used by people walking.
(Australia, New Zealand, India) A paved path located at the side of a road for the use of pedestrians.
